front.title: Calibration of Measured Time Values between Network Elements

abstract.t: Network devices are incorporating capabilities for time stamping certain packets so that such time stamps can reference the time at which a packet passes through a given device (at ingress or egress). Those stamps or marks are relevant to calculating the measured delay and can be used for traffic engineering purposes. This draft proposes a methodology for Calibrating the measurements from different network element implementations in a common measurement scenario.
